name: SetSpawnInfo
description: This function can be used to change the spawn information of a specific player. It allows you to automatically set someone's spawn weapons, their team, skin and spawn position, normally used in case of minigames or automatic-spawn systems. This function is more crash-safe then using SetPlayerSkin in OnPlayerSpawn and/or OnPlayerRequestClass, even though this has been fixed in 0.2.
params_title: (playerid, team, skin, Float:x, Float:y, Float:z, Float:rotation, weapon1, weapon1_ammo, weapon2, weapon2_ammo, weapon3, weapon3_ammo)

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The PlayerID of who you want to set the spawn information.

params_body.name: team
params_body.description: The Team-ID of the chosen player.

params_body.name: skin
params_body.description: The skin which the player will spawn with.

params_body.name: Float:X
params_body.description: The X-coordinate of the player's spawn position.

params_body.name: Float:Y
params_body.description: The Y-coordinate of the player's spawn position.

params_body.name: Float:Z
params_body.description: The Z-coordinate of the player's spawn position.

params_body.name: Float:rotation
params_body.description: The direction in which the player needs to be facing after spawning.

params_body.name: weapon1
params_body.description: The first spawn-weapon for the player.

params_body.name: weapon1_ammo
params_body.description: The amount of ammunition for the primary spawnweapon.

params_body.name: weapon2
params_body.description: The second spawn-weapon for the player.

params_body.name: weapon2_ammo
params_body.description: The amount of ammunition for the second spawnweapon.

params_body.name: weapon3
params_body.description: The third spawn-weapon for the player.

params_body.name: weapon3_ammo
params_body.description: The amount of ammunition for the third spawnweapon.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
related_fn:
SetPlayerSkin: Set a player's skin.
